医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
TLR10 rs10004195基因型对幽门螺杆菌感染易感性的影响幽门螺杆菌（H. pylori）感染可引起多种继发性消化系统疾病。一些研究发现，Toll样受体（TLR）基因的多态性，包括TLR10 rs10004195，可能与幽门螺杆菌感染的易感性增加有关。尽管报告相互矛盾，我们还是进行了荟萃分析，以阐明这些因素之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Impact-of-TLR10-rs10004195-genotype-on-susceptibility-to-H-pylori-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Impact-of-TLR10-rs10004195-genotype-on-susceptibility-to-H-pylori-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77fd1aba-4058-4f8a-b345-ffc2722e4d80 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:31:39 -0400 Impact of TLR10 rs10004195 genotype on susceptibility to H. pylori infection
探讨 α-1 抗胰蛋白酶缺乏症中慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 与肝脏疾病之间的关系α-1 抗胰蛋白酶缺乏症 (AATD) 是一种遗传性疾病，其特征是肝细胞内 α-1 抗胰蛋白酶 (AAT) 突变体的错误折叠和积累，这限制了其进入循环系统并使肺部暴露于蛋白酶介导的组织损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Investigating-the-relationship- Between-COPD-and-liver-disease-in-alpha-1-antitrypsin-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Investigating-the-relationship- Between-COPD-and-liver-disease-in-alpha-1-antitrypsin-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77dc56eb-9ab4-4dda-b436-40c5925bac83 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:28:01 -0400 Investigating the relationship between COPD and liver disease in alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency
替诺福韦阿米布芬酰胺不会改变慢性乙型肝炎患者的血脂水平替诺福韦阿米布芬酰胺 (TMF) 对慢性乙型肝炎 (CHB) 患者血脂的影响尚不清楚。本研究旨在探讨TMF是否影响CHB患者48周内的血脂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/替诺福韦-amibufenamide-does-not-alter-lipid-levels-in-患者-with-chronic-hepatitis-B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/替诺福韦-amibufenamide-does-not-alter-lipid-levels-in-患者-with-chronic-hepatitis-B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77ae7a13-1a8f-48c4-a341-83ce6c766f27 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:22:45 -0400 Tenofovir amibufenamide does not alter lipid levels in patients with chronic hepatitis B
MALDI-TOF 质谱法被证明可有效诊断指甲银屑病中的甲真菌病指甲银屑病在斑块状银屑病患者中很常见，并且与包括甲真菌病在内的发病率相关，甲真菌病会使银屑病治疗复杂化并且难以区分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/MALDI-TOF-mass-spectrometry-proves- effective-for-diagnosing-onychomycosis-in-nail-psoriasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/MALDI-TOF-mass-spectrometry-proves- effective-for-diagnosing-onychomycosis-in-nail-psoriasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0abe46bf-31bf-4e7d-8e55-d65605b0d3ae Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:20:30 -0400 MALDI-TOF mass spectrometry proves effective for diagnosing onychomycosis in nail psoriasis
GRB2 和 SOS1 的新发现可能为癌症治疗铺平道路东京都立大学的研究人员发现了细胞中蛋白质 GRB2 和 SOS1 如何将信号从膜受体传递到细胞核的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Novel-findings-on-GRB2-and-SOS1-could-pave-the-way-for-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Novel-findings-on-GRB2-and-SOS1-could-pave-the-way-for-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbbcfa16-96d6-4c61-84a9-219f5754ece9 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:07:15 -0400 Novel findings on GRB2 and SOS1 could pave the way for cancer treatments
新型多生物标志物方法增强慢性肾病风险评估先前将新型肾脏生物标志物识别为慢性肾脏病（CKD）进展危险因素的努力通常是单独评估蛋白质，这限制了它们的预后能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Novel-multi-biomarker-approach-enhances-chronic-kidney-disease-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Novel-multi-biomarker-approach-enhances-chronic-kidney-disease-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aed34d46-b9c7-47fc-be16-ba2a656fb152 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 22:53:55 -0400 Novel multi-biomarker approach enhances chronic kidney disease risk assessment
研究揭示了寄生虫如何逃避瘙痒反应曾经有过鼻子发痒，或者更糟糕的是，背上某个难以触及的地方让你发疯的经历吗？现在想象一下，无论你抓得多用力或多长时间，瘙痒都不会消失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Research-uncovers-how-parasitic-worms-evade-itch-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Research-uncovers-how-parasitic-worms-evade-itch-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74c70622-f3e5-4297-98a3-ca7341de7481 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 22:50:11 -0400 Research uncovers how parasitic worms evade itch response
新试验显示 felzartamab 可降低 IgA 肾病患者的蛋白尿IgA 肾病 (IgAN) 是一种自身免疫性肾脏疾病，由表面表达 CD38 蛋白质的免疫细胞驱动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/New-Trial-shows-felzartamab-reduces- Proteinuria-in-IgA-nephropathy-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/New-Trial-shows-felzartamab-reduces- Proteinuria-in-IgA-nephropathy- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=868be4b5-d7ce-444f-a3f1-822788467a7b Sat, 26 Oct 2024 22:31:18 -0400 New trial shows felzartamab reduces proteinuria in IgA nephropathy patients
新分析证实卡格列净对老年人的心血管和肾脏有益钠-葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 (SGLT2) 抑制剂可降低 2 型糖尿病患者心血管和肾脏结局的风险，但尚不清楚其效果是否因患者年龄而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/New-analysis-confirms-canagliflozins-cardioangio-and-kidney-benefits-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/New-analysis-confirms-canagliflozins-cardioangio-and-kidney-benefits-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7437c70d-ae54-467f-9180-3f6de0d63dab Sat, 26 Oct 2024 22:28:59 -0400 New analysis confirms canagliflozin's cardiovascular and kidney benefits in older adults
研究：GLP-1RA 与抗癌治疗期间的急性肾损伤风险无关胰高血糖素样肽 1 受体激动剂 (GLP-1RA) 是越来越多地用于治疗 2 型糖尿病和充血性心力衰竭患者的药物。 GLP-1RA 相关急性肾损伤 (AKI) 的报道已经出现，但使用抗癌药物的患者发生 GLP-1RA 相关 AKI 的风险尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Study-GLP-1RA-not-linked-with-acute-kidney-injury-risk-during-anti-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Study-GLP-1RA-not-linked-with-acute-kidney-injury-risk-during-anti-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b24d66b-9914-4071-9dcc-063ece12928d Sat, 26 Oct 2024 22:23:52 -0400 Study: GLP-1RA not associated with acute kidney injury risk during anti-cancer treatments
